text: Milo Poulson is an alternative cartoonist known for the exploration of gay themes in his comics. His work was included in Gay Comix. ==References== ==External links== * Comic Book Database * Guide to the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender (LGBT) Collection at the Smithsonian Institution National Museum of American History Archives Center Category:Alternative cartoonists Category:Living people Category:LGBT comics creators Category:Underground cartoonists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Milo Poulson
